3340f99b-b4e1-4719-b179-bdda395a66f5.name: [Custom] Cluster Host Maintenance Mode Count
3340f99b-b4e1-4719-b179-bdda395a66f5.formula: count(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=HostSystem, metric=runtime|maintenanceState, depth=1, where = "startsWith inMaintenance"})

9a16a77a-206d-4ee9-bcaf-0e1de7abb9ca.name: [Custom] Host VM Load Double Expected Amount
9a16a77a-206d-4ee9-bcaf-0e1de7abb9ca.formula: (min(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=ClusterComputeResource, metric=summary|total_number_hosts, depth=-1}) == 2) && (min(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=ClusterComputeResource, metric=Super Metric|sm_3340f99b-b4e1-4719-b179-bdda395a66f5, depth=-1}) >0 ) ? 0: ((min(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=ClusterComputeResource, metric=summary|vm_count_per_host, depth=-1}) * 2) <  ${this, metric=summary|number_running_vms})
